name: stcalcal
body:
### StCalCal (or Calendrica)
In this repo I keep the _Calendrica_ package for calendrical calculations in [Squeak](www.squeak.org)'s Smalltalk.
It is actually a FileTree-based Monticello repository where I can save my code in plain text and not in binary serialized objects.

In terms of functionality I have a [similar project](http://espinielli.github.com/pycalcal) for Python where the implementation is functional rather than object-oriented as it is here.

## How to load this package
You need to have and do the following:

* Squeak updated to latest Trunk
* FileTree installed
* fork this project, say in */home/you/git/*

>    cd /home/you/git

>    git clone https://github.com/espinielli/stcalcal.git

* open a new filetree-based Monticello on the git dir and load the relevant code

## How to use this code
Well run and read the companion tests!
